## ⚠️ IMPORTANT SECURITY NOTICE

**If this is a critical security vulnerability, please DO NOT create a public issue.**

Instead:
1. Email the maintainers directly
2. Use GitHub Security Advisories (recommended)
3. Provide details privately

For non-critical security improvements, you may proceed with this template.

---

## Security Issue Type

- [ ] Vulnerability (XSS, SQL Injection, etc.)
- [ ] Insecure configuration
- [ ] Dependency vulnerability
- [ ] Authentication/Authorization issue
- [ ] Data exposure
- [ ] Security improvement suggestion
- [ ] Other

## Severity Assessment

- [ ] Critical (immediate attention required)
- [ ] High (affects security significantly)
- [ ] Medium (potential security impact)
- [ ] Low (minor security concern)

## Checklist

- [ ] I have assessed the severity appropriately
- [ ] This is not a critical vulnerability (or I've reported it privately)
- [ ] I have provided sufficient details
- [ ] I have suggested a potential fix if possible

---

**Note:** For critical vulnerabilities, please use [GitHub Security Advisories](https://github.com/lavish112000/Blog/security/advisories) to report privately.
